Uses of Class
edu.pdx.cs410J.cox.PhoneBill

    • Uses of PhoneBill in edu.pdx.cs410J.cox

      Methods in edu.pdx.cs410J.cox that return PhoneBill 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      PhoneBill TextParser.parse()
      This method accepts a String containing the name of an existing text file, checks that it exists, reads and formats the customer's name, then reads phonecall information and calls setCall to add it to the PhoneBill
      PhoneBill TextParser.setCall​(PhoneBill bill, java.lang.String callInfo)
      This method receives a string containing PhoneCall data that it parses and adds to a PhoneBill if it is formatted correctly.
      Methods in edu.pdx.cs410J.cox with parameters of type PhoneBill 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void TextDumper.dump​(PhoneBill bill)
      This method accepts a PhoneBill, and creates a string with all of its information formatted so that TextParser can read it in correctly.
      PhoneBill TextParser.setCall​(PhoneBill bill, java.lang.String callInfo)
      This method receives a string containing PhoneCall data that it parses and adds to a PhoneBill if it is formatted correctly.
